citation.article-title: Description of Sulfitobacter donghicola sp. nov., isolated from seawater of the East Sea in Korea, transfer of Staleya guttiformis Labrenz et al. 2000 to the genus Sulfitobacter as Sulfitobacter guttiformis comb. nov. and emended description of the genus Sulfitobacter
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Description of Sulfitobacter guttiformis (Labrenz et al. 2000) comb. nov.
Sulfitobacter guttiformis (gut.ti.forâ€²mis. L. fem. n. gutta a drop; L. adj. suff. -formis in the shape of; N.L. masc. adj. guttiformis drop-shaped).
Basonym: Staleya guttiformis Labrenz et al. 2000.
The description is as given by Labrenz et al. (2000).
The type strain is strain EL-38T =ATCC BAA-5T =DSM 11458T =JCM 21791T.
